forumNotes.author: friske
forumNotes.content:
I have downloaded "Standard 7 SP1 64bit IBW" and would to try to use winload.exe in boot in the current win7 installation.

When i change the item with bcdedit i receive a "windows can not verify the digital signature of this file".

Do it have fix to it?

forumNotes.author: Zoso
forumNotes.content:
hi friske,  

I think you need to turn on test signing for digital signatures. can be done manually or with easyBCD i think.
